nodes.text: The SX-14 Field Hover-Ute was a Mobquet Swoops and Speeders utility vehicle design.

The Hover-Ute was used for practical labor assistance by individuals living hard lives, such as Owen Lars on his Tatooine moisture farm. Owen's hover-ute was equipped with a vaporator embedder/extractor, auto-siphon, and insulated water-storage tank. His vehicle also utilized a detachable load carrier.
